selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final integer answer as required.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the final answer as 'Answer: ...'.

new_skill_specs.name: extract_volume_from_image
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract the total volume from an image of a measuring cup with volume markings.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The total volume as an integer.
edge_cases: Image is blurry or markings are unclear
Markings are in an unusual unit
